title: Tech company CEO, wife, children murdered in mansion fire; was his own brothers' jealousy motive for murder?
itunes:title: Tech company CEO, wife, children murdered in mansion fire; was his own brothers' jealousy motive for murder?
description:
The brother of a businessman found shot to death at his New Jersey mansion has been charged with four murders, including the deaths of his sister-in-law, niece and nephew. Paul Caneiro, 51, is also charged with setting fire to his and his brother's home. Nancy Grace explores the case with forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan -- author of "Blood Beneath My Feet," North Carolina family and divorce lawyer Kathleen Murphy, and Crime Stories reporter Robyn Walensky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
